comments.author: zoe
comments.content: These both sounds so delicious. I think Ill try the soba noodles first. Do you think I can use rice noodle instead? Its been sitting in my pantry for months now!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hi Zoe - You could do a dish like this with rice noodles, absolutely! See also https://herbivoracious.com/2007/11/recipe-rice-bow.html for another option.

comments.author: The Other Tiger
comments.content: Thanks for linking to these...they both sound really good at the moment, and I wasn't around to see them the first time.
